alert.note: Alert for Alaska Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 08 at 3:11PM AKDT until October 10 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Alaska Peninsula, including Cold Bay. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An area of low pressure will track along and just north of the Aleutians Sunday night into Monday. Strong west to northwest winds will develop to the south of the low center as it tracks over the Alaska Peninsula. Additionally, cold air advection on the backside of the low will help to enhance gusty winds.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
